Package com.scheduler.business

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.scheduler.business.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Class performs business logic operations on User objects. Implemented using a Singleton pattern to simplify keeping User objects in sync across Front End and Business Logic, and between those objects and the Database.
Author:
Dillon Christensen

      public User getUserByUsername(String username)
      Get a user by its unique username.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique identifier used to query the user instance
      Returns:
      Matching user instance or null if not found

    • getUsernames

      public List<String> getUsernames()
      Get a list of all usernames.
      Returns:
      List of usernames or empty list if no names were found

    • getIdByUsername

      public int getIdByUsername(String username)
      Get ID value from the user associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - Unique identifier used to query for the user instance
      Returns:
      ID value or value of -1 if no user is found

    • getUsernameById

      public String getUsernameById(int id)
      Get username value from the user associated with the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier used to query for user instance
      Returns:
      Username value or empty string literal if no user is found
